content.text: 0) In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, butter and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@24:31 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "sugar"@36:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "milk"@43:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "butter"@49:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@60:64 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a heavy saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "boil"@14:18 / AC
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium heat"@24:35 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-1-1 "stirring"@37:45 / AC )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Remove from the heat; stir in remaining ingredients.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:source ( tool-2-0 "the heat"@15:23 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "stir in"@25:32 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining ingredients"@33:54 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
			:ref ( ing-7 )
		)
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Drop by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper-lined baking sheets.
4) Let stand at room temperature until cool.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "stand"@7:12 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "room temperature"@16:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until cool"@33:43 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
